subject: p10268877
History: -year-old male with PEA arrest, pulmonary edema and intubated, assess for interval change.
Findings: Portable AP semi-upright radiograph is presented for review. Endotracheal tube terminates 53 cm above the carina. Nasogastric tube courses into the stomach and out of view. Improved aeration is seen in the left base with some minimal residual atelectasis. Mild pulmonary vascular congestion is seen without findings of edema. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged.
